name: The Clucking End
description:
The Clucking End is a game where you take controll of a human turned chicken on a quest to regain their human form after being cursed by the evil Crimson Witch! 

Meet quirky characters, enjoy the humourous dialog, use the environment and your skills to avoid the Pigmen, and most of all,  be a chicken, in this fun topdown 2d Solid Snake inspired style game.

--Controls--

WASD - Move

E - Interact / UI Select

Q - UI Select

Space - Dash

Reach the red flags at the end of each level to progress, and avoid the gaze of the pigmen or risk restarting your current level! Not all is lost if caught by a Pigman, as they'll play a game of chance with you to gain your freedom.

Thanks for playing! Hope you enjoy it!
